content: not a single purl stitch yay and hey - size is adjustable - you may repeat garter stitch and lace parts as many times as you wish *update july 24th 2018 there are now revised versions of english and finnish files * -- thanks to elisabetm 1 now also in swedish thank you mjinbarcelona 2 for the spanish translation maintenant aussi en francais merci bien lalie-78 3 also in italian thank you ilaria70 4 and now also in german thank you theolinchen412 5 thanks to dashuta 6 now also in russian thank you knittintin 7 for being my photographer test knitter and joojoo-man 1 http //www ravelry com/people/elisabetm 2 http //www ravelry com/people/mjinbarcelona 3 http //www ravelry com/people/lalie-78 4 http //www ravelry com/people/ilaria70 5 http //www ravelry com/people/theolinchen412 6 http //www ravelry com/people/dashuta 7 http //www ravelry com/people/knittintin
